results.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It does not dishonor others, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres.
results.reason: Describes the characteristics of true love.
results.reflection: True love is selfless, patient, and enduring.

results.text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
results.reason: God's ultimate act of love towards humanity.
results.reflection: God's love is sacrificial and offers eternal life.

results.text: We love because he first loved us.
results.reason: Our capacity to love is rooted in God's love for us.
results.reflection: God's love empowers us to love others.

results.text: Be completely humble and gentle; be patient, bearing with one another in love. Make every effort to keep the unity of the Spirit through the bond of peace.
results.reason: Emphasizes the importance of love in maintaining unity.
results.reflection: Love fosters harmony and peace among believers.

results.text: Above all, love each other deeply, because love covers over a multitude of sins.
results.reason: Highlights the power of love to forgive and restore.
results.reflection: Love has the ability to mend broken relationships and offer forgiveness.
